001package imagingbook.pub.corners.subpixel_obsolete;
002
003
004import imagingbook.lib.math.Matrix;
005import imagingbook.lib.settings.PrintPrecision;
006
007/**
008 * 2D interpolator based on fitting a quartic polynomial to the supplied samples.
009 * Samples s0,...,s8 must be arranged in the following order:
010 * <pre>
011 *    s4 s3 s2
012 *    s5 s0 s1
013 *    s6 s7 s8 </pre>
014 * All sample values are used.
015 * @author WB
016 * @version 2020/09/29
017 * @deprecated
018 */
019public class QuarticInterpolator2D implements PolynomialInterpolator2D {
020        
021        private static int maxIterationsDefault = 100;
022        
023        private final double[] c;       // polynomial coefficients
024        
025        private final int maxIterations;
026        private final double minMove = 1e-6;    // smallest move to continue search 
027        private final double searchWindow = 0.6;                // x/y search boundary (-xyLimit, +xyLimit)
028        
029        @SuppressWarnings("unused")
030        private final float[] s;        // TODO: for testing only - remove!
031        
032        public QuarticInterpolator2D(float[] s, int maxIterations) {
033                this.s = s;     // TODO: for testing only - remove!
034                this.maxIterations = maxIterations;
035                c = new double[9];
036                c[0] = s[0];
037                c[1] = (s[1] - s[5]) / 2;
038                c[2] = (s[7] - s[3]) / 2;
039                c[3] = (s[1] - 2 * s[0] + s[5]) / 2;
040                c[4] = (s[3] - 2 * s[0] + s[7]) / 2;
041                c[5] = (s[4] + s[8] - s[2] - s[6]) / 4;
042                c[6] = (s[6] + s[8] - s[2] - s[4]) / 4 - c[2];
043                c[7] = (s[2] + s[8] - s[4] - s[6]) / 4 - c[1];
044                c[8] = s[0] - (s[1] + s[3] + s[5] + s[7]) / 2 + (s[2] + s[4] + s[6] + s[8]) / 4;
045                // TODO: check for zero values of c[3], c[4]
046        }
047        
048        public QuarticInterpolator2D(float[] s) {
049                this(s, maxIterationsDefault);
050        }
051        
052        // ---------------------------------------------------------
053
054        @Override
055        public double[] getCoefficients() {
056                return c;
057        }
058        
059        public double[] getGradient(double[] xy) {
060                return this.getGradient(xy[0], xy[1]);
061        }
062
063        @Override
064        public double[] getGradient(double x, double y) {
065                double gx = c[1] + 2*c[3]*x + c[5]*y + 2*c[6]*x*y + c[7]*y*y + 2*c[8]*x*y*y;
066                double gy = c[2] + c[5]*x + 2*c[4]*y + 2*c[7]*x*y + c[6]*x*x + 2*c[8]*x*x*y;
067                return new double[] {gx, gy};
068        }
069        
070        public double[][] getHessian(double[] xy) {
071                return this.getHessian(xy[0], xy[1]);
072        }
073
074        @Override
075        public double[][] getHessian(double x, double y) {
076                double[][] H = {
077                                {2*(c[3] + c[6]*y + c[8]*y*y), c[5] + 2*(c[6]*x + c[7]*y) + 4*c[8]*x*y}, 
078                                {c[5] + 2*(c[6]*x + c[7]*y) + 4*c[8]*x*y, 2*(c[4] + c[7]*x + c[8]*x*x)}
079                                };
080                return H;
081        }
082        
083        public double[][] getInverseHessian(double[] xy) {
084                return this.getInverseHessian(xy[0], xy[1]);
085        }
086        
087        public double[][] getInverseHessian(double x, double y) {
088                double R = 2*(c[4] + x*(c[7] + c[8]*x));
089                double S = 2*(c[3] + y*(c[6] + c[8]*y));
090                double T = c[5] + 2*c[6]*x + 2*c[7]*y + 4*c[8]*x*y;
091                double a = 1.0 / (R*S - T*T);
092                double[][] Hi = {
093                                { a*R, -a*T}, 
094                                {-a*T,  a*S}};
095                return Hi;
096        }
097        
098        @Override
099        public float getInterpolatedValue(double x, double y) {
100                return (float) (c[0] + c[1]*x + c[2]*y + c[3]*x*x + c[4]*y*y
101                                                + c[5]*x*y + c[6]*x*x*y + c[7]*x*y*y + c[8]*x*x*y*y);
102        }
103        
104        private boolean closeEnough(double a, double b) {
105                return Math.abs(a - b) < minMove;
106        }
107
108        @Override
109        public float[] getMaxPosition() {
110//              System.out.format("Searching for max position (maxIterations=%d, minDelta=%f)\n", 
111//                              maxIterations, minMove);
112                double[] Xcur = {0, 0};
113                boolean inside = true;
114                int n;
115                for (n = 1; n <= maxIterations; n++) {
116                        
117                        if (Xcur[0] < -searchWindow || Xcur[0] > searchWindow || Xcur[1] < -searchWindow || Xcur[1] > searchWindow) {
118                                inside = false;
119                                break;
120                        }
121                        
122                        double[] Xnext = this.getNextMaxPosition(Xcur);
123                        if (closeEnough(Xcur[0], Xnext[0]) && closeEnough(Xcur[1], Xnext[1])) {
124                                break;
125                        }
126                        
127//                      double dx = Xcur[0] - Xnext[0];
128//                      double dy = Xcur[1] - Xnext[1];
129//                      System.out.format("   X(%d) = %s, d = (%.6f,%.6f)\n", n, Matrix.toString(Xcur), dx, dy);
130                        
131                        Xcur[0] = Xnext[0];
132                        Xcur[1] = Xnext[1];
133                }
134                
135                if (n >= maxIterations) {
136                        return null;
137//                      throw new RuntimeException("getMaxPosition() did not converge, s = \n" + toString(s));
138                }
139                if (!inside) {
140                        return null;
141//                      throw new RuntimeException("getMaxPosition() exceeded search limit!");
142                }
143                return new float[] {(float) Xcur[0], (float) Xcur[1]};
144        }
145        
146        /**
147         * Estimate max. position using Taylor expansion from the given position
148         * @param X Taylor expansion point
149         * @return the estimated maximum position
150         */
151        public double[] getNextMaxPosition(double[] X) {
152                double[] g = this.getGradient(X);
153                double[][] Hi = this.getInverseHessian(X);
154                return Matrix.add(X, Matrix.multiply(Matrix.multiply(-1, Hi), g));
155        }
156        
157        // ---------------------------------------------------------
158
159        public static void main(String[] args) {
160                PrintPrecision.set(8);
161                float[] samples = {16,9,7,11,8,15,14,12,10}; // = s_0,...,s_8
162//              float[] samples = {40229.785156f, 33941.535156f, 25963.150391f, 39558.175781f, 39078.843750f, 33857.863281f, 39861.664063f, 38746.250000f, 33652.839844f};
163
164                QuarticInterpolator2D interp = new QuarticInterpolator2D(samples);
165                
166                System.out.println(QuarticInterpolator2D.class.getName());
167                System.out.println("c = " + Matrix.toString(interp.getCoefficients()));
168                
169                double[][] iVals = new double[3][3];
170                for (int v = -1; v <= 1; v++) {
171                        for (int u = -1; u <= 1; u++) {
172                                iVals[v+1][u+1] = interp.getInterpolatedValue(u, v);
173                        }
174                }
175                System.out.println("iVals = " + Matrix.toString(iVals));
176
177                System.out.println("g(0,0) = " + Matrix.toString(interp.getGradient(0, 0)));
178                System.out.println("g(0.5,-0.75) = " + Matrix.toString(interp.getGradient(0.5, -0.75)));
179                
180                System.out.println("H(0,0) = " + Matrix.toString(interp.getHessian(0, 0)));
181                System.out.println("H(0.5,-0.75) = " + Matrix.toString(interp.getHessian(0.5, -0.75)));
182                
183                float[] pMax = interp.getMaxPosition();
184                if (pMax != null) {
185                        System.out.println("pMax = " + Matrix.toString(pMax));
186                        System.out.println("vMax = " + interp.getInterpolatedValue(pMax));
187                }
188                else {
189                        System.out.println("*** pMax could not be located! ***");
190                }
191        }
192}
